item.title: Overheard at the TriLUG meeting
item.description: Interesting: evilaptop: Dude, CHICKS DIG UNIX evilaptop: Everyone knows that evilaptop: Right?? JasonF: that’s almost as unattractive as someone who scripts festival to sing “99 bottles of beer on the wall” at a party Funny how a lot of the attendees were also chatting on #trilug! hehehe What??? You’re actually interested in how to do it??? Ok, ok… The source code was also provided! hehehehe #!/usr/bin/python # 99 bottles of beer on the wall.
